( 2*100 patient ) Research Objectives : The primary research objective evaluate : ) anterior knee pain ii ) nail position overall fracture alignment Outcome Measures : 1 . Nail position mean intra-operative fluoroscopy post operative x-ray . 2 . Anterior Knee pain mean VAS-scores , Kneeling test Subjective outcome mean Patient questionnaire 3 . Knee-related adverse event 4 . Overall fracture alignment
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Surgical Technique Intramedullary Tibia Nailing , Using Trigen META Tibia Nails
DOC.detailed_description: After surgery standard intramedullary nailing technique tibia fracture , 40-80 % patient still complain anterior knee pain postoperative . The expected advantage semi-extended nail technique less anterior knee pain less malunion fracture . Using semi-extended nailing technique also might give advantage good position nail concentric ream tibia , due less tension patella tendon ream process .
